about_section.title: About Us
about_section.description: We're building the next generation of super AI tools that push the boundaries of what's possible. Starting with cutting-edge OSINT solutions, we combine advanced machine learning, reverse engineering, and innovative AI techniques to create applications that showcase frontier AI capabilities.
about_section.mission_description: To develop groundbreaking AI applications that test the limits of frontier AI ability. While our current focus is OSINT tools, we're expanding into diverse domains—building products that demonstrate what becomes possible when you harness the full potential of modern AI.
about_section.vision_description: We envision ourselves as pioneers in the super AI application space. Beyond OSINT, we're charting new territories—creating tools that redefine industry standards and prove that the next wave of transformative AI products is already here.
about_section.address_value: Room 807, Block A, North Phase of Longguang Jiuzuan, Hongshan Community, Minzhi Street, Longhua District, Shenzhen

products_section.title: Our Products
products_section.geoseer_description: GeoSeer is a sophisticated platform that uses cutting-edge AI to identify locations from uploaded images. Combining geoestimation models, multi-agent analysis, and reasoning verification, it provides unprecedented accuracy in image-based geolocation.
products_section.geoseer_feature_1: Fine-tuned geoestimation models for precise location detection
products_section.geoseer_feature_2: Multi-agent AI architecture with reverse engineering capabilities
products_section.geoseer_feature_3: Reasoning verification for validated, accurate results
